GREEN APPLE SCENT: Features a long-lasting, fresh green apple scent

body.description: "Brought to you by the #1 dermatologist-recommended brand, Head and Shoulders Green Apple Shampoo provides proven protection against flakes, itch,+ oil^ and dryness to give you shiny, vibrant hair and a healthy scalp. Head and Shoulders’ unique formula works 7 surface layers deep in your scalp to help stop dandruff at its source and maintain healthy hair. Your scalp can come under attack from heat, sweat, pollution and stress, which can aggravate dandruff, but refreshing Green Apple Shampoo nourishes your hair and scalp with restorative moisture for a clean feel and healthy, hydrated scalp. Ignite your senses and feel it working with every wash as you lather up for a luxurious shower experience with the long-lasting scent of green apple and power of Head and Shoulders anti-dandruff shampoo. Our unique formula, with zinc pyrithione, delivers multiple benefits: Fights dryness Calms itching+ Relieves irritation+ Reduces redness+ Controls oiliness^ Removes flakes+^ * visible flakes; with regular use ** based on volume of sales + associated with dandruff ^ washes away oil and flakes"

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Head and Shoulders Shampoo, Anti Dandruff Treatment and Scalp Care, Green Apple Fights flakes and invigorates your hair and scalp Multi-symptom relief offers protection from flakes, itch and dryness Refreshes scalp to relieve dandruff symptoms while cleansing and hydrating hair The lasting scent of green apples leaves your hair smelling fresh and clean

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Apple Smell
reviews.reviewText: This dandruff shampoo smells great and seems to do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean, shiny and moisturized
reviews.reviewText: This is worth the buy!!At a great price and it come shrink wrapped that keeps everything in place. I have always used head and shoulders and so has my family. Just buying two is a no brainer! The pump works every time! And the scent of apple is classic crisp and clean. Leaves your hair and scalp clean shiny and moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sent the wrong item
reviews.reviewText: Head and Shoulders is a great shampoo, does a decent job of cleaning my son's hair (would do better if he washed it better lol), also has a nice smell, not the medicated smell other dandruff shampoos do. My only complaint is Amazon sent me the wrong one, I order the Head and Shoulders Shampoo, Anti Dandruff Treatment, Green Apple, they sent me the shampoo+conditioner, my son's hair is oily and conditioner makes it more so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t had any issues with dandruff since switching to this shampoo and it smells nice.
